content: As an AI language model, I don't have any personal favorites. However, I can tell you that many people admire Shakespeare's character of Hamlet for his depth and complexity. He is a multifaceted character, who struggles with grief, guilt, and indecision. His psychological complexity and contemplative nature have drawn many viewers and readers to his story. Additionally, many people appreciate the strong and independent women in Shakespeare's plays, like Rosalind in "As You Like It" or Viola in "Twelfth Night", who challenge gender norms and defy expectations.
